references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000

Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6, -15, 20, -15, 6, -1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[x (3+2x)/(1-x)^6,{x,0,40}],x] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[ {6,-15,20,-15,6,-1},{0,3,20,75,210,490},40] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 24 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: G.f. adapted to the offset by _Bruno Berselli_, May 17 2011
